channel.title: CACHE PROBLEM! Smart people help meeeee :)
channel.description:
My cache isnt working the server i downloaded couldn't find the path specified so i edited the run and compile for both client and source so now it starts up but stays on this one page which says "Error loading cache..."
The client + source i downloaded was (Project DungeonFest)
Please leave helpful comments only if you wanna hate just message me ill be sure not to look at them.

item.title: CACHE PROBLEM! Smart people help meeeee :)
item.dc:creator: @Mike_101994 Mike 101994
item.description:
@Mike_101994 wrote:

The problem with the cache is because it is trying to autodownload it but it can’t because the clientSettings.java contained the wrong directory. When the guy tried to fix it the new url he posted was broken. So unless you can get the cache some way by contacting the guy who posted the source you can’t run the client.

Read full topic
item.source: CACHE PROBLEM! Smart people help meeeee :)

(At the bottom it states something about fixing cache and a download i dont know what to do with it)
Hoping you could help me!
